::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod is hit by the Optic laser blast, he falls to the ground.
"Go get them Omega! You jest made a big mistake, Predicon!"
Hot Rod jumps up, fireing plasma charges, optic lasers, and two rockets
at all Preds.

(OOC: Sorry, Inferno.)
